member.name: M:Dynamicweb.DataIntegration.Providers.DynamicwebProvider.DynamicwebBulkInsertDestinationWriter.DeleteExcessGroupProductsRelationsTable
member.summary: Deletes rows not present in the import source. This method is called when "PartialUpdate" field settings is set to "true" in the job xml file in the config section. This method should never be called, unless you're absolutely sure it does what you need.

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.DataIntegration.Providers.DynamicwebProvider.DynamicwebProvider.PartialUpdate
member.summary: This property is used to remove rows from the EcomGroupProductRelationsTable, but only for the products that are being imported. It can be set in the job settings xml file in the config section
